['Abbreviated Title: Ph II SGI110 in Peds & Adults', '89', 'Version Date: 07/22/2019', 'PROMIS Item Bank v.1.0/1.1 - Global', 'Salud general', 'Responda a cada enunciado marcando una casilla por línea.', 'Muy', 'Excelente', 'buena', 'Buena', 'Pasable', 'Mala', 'Global01', 'En general, diría que su salud es', '5', '4', '3', '2', '1', 'Global03', 'En general, diría que su calidad de vida es', '5', '4', '3', '2', '1', 'GlobalDG', 'En general, ¿cómo calificaría su salud física?', '5', '4', '3', '2', '1', 'En general, ¿cómo calificaría su salud mental,', 'Global04', 'incluidos su estado de ánimo y su capacidad para', '5', '4', '3', '2', '1', 'pensar?', 'En general, ¿cómo calificaría su satisfacción con', 'Globalds', 'sus actividades sociales y sus relaciones con', '5', '4', '3', '2', '1', 'otras personas?', 'En general, califique en que medida puede', 'realizar sus actividades sociales y funciones', 'habituales. (Esto comprende las actividades en', 'casa, en el trabajo y en el área donde reside, así', '5', '4', '3', '2', '1', 'Global09', 'como sus responsabilidades como padre o madre,', 'hijo/a, cónyuge, empleado/a, amigo/a, etc.)', 'Completa-', 'En su', 'Moderada-', 'mente', 'mavoria', 'mente', 'Un poco', 'Para nada', '¿ En que medida puede realizar sus actividades', 'Global06', 'físicas diarias, como caminar, subir escaleras,', '5', '4', '3', '2', '1', 'cargar las compras o mover una silla?', 'Spanish (Universal)', '15 Feb 2012', 'o 2008-2012 PROMIS Health Organization and PROMIS Cooperative Group', 'Page 1 of 2']['Abbreviated Title: Ph II SGI110 in Peds & Adults', '90', 'Version Date: 07/22/2019', '16.4 APPENDIX IV: THE DISTRESS AND SYMPTOM CHECKLIST: THE DISTRESS', 'THERMOMETER', 'DISTRESS RATING TOOL', 'Patient', 'NAME:', 'DOB:', 'DATE:', 'INSTRUCTIONS: We know that all people can get sad and stressed out from time to time.', 'Sometimes people can get overwhelmed and distressed by managing all the aspects of their own life', 'along with their illness. When we say distress, we are referring to a range of feelings that can include', 'sadness, being anxious, fearful, worried, or upset. These feelings may affect how you feel physically', 'and emotionally.', 'On the thermometer below, circle the number that best describes how much distress you have', 'been feeling IN THE PAST MONTH with a "0" indicating no distress at all and a "10" indicating', 'the most distress you could possibly feel. Then, after indicating the level of distress on the', 'thermometer, please check the causes of YOUR distress.', 'Practical', 'Emotional', 'Have you been stressed about:', 'Have you been:', 'Not understanding what is', 'Worried/Anxious', 'happening to my body', 'Sad/Depressed', 'School work, work', 'Lonely/Feeling Alone', 'High Distress 10', 'Guilt/self-doubt', 'Taking a lot of medications', 'All my medical needs', 'Bored', '9', 'Doctor/hospital visits', 'Irritable', '8', 'Future plans- job/career', 'Afraid to be alone', 'Not having good friends', '7', 'Hopeless', 'Other Problems:', 'Difficulty making decisions', '6', 'Worthless', 'Moderate Distress', '5', 'Unhappy with how your body', 'looks (If so, what part', ')', '4', 'Having trouble concentrating', '3', 'Having racing thoughts', 'Spiritual', 'Scared (of', ')', '2', 'Have you been stressed about:', 'Angry', 'Spiritual Questions', '1', 'Other Problems:', 'Difficulties Praying', 'No Distress', '0', 'Feeling Distanced from God', 'Loss of Faith', 'Physical', 'Other Problems:', 'Have you been having problems with:', 'Pain', 'Getting around', 'Fatigue/lack of energy', 'Too much energy', 'Family/Social', 'Sleeping through the night', 'Have you been stressed about:', 'My weight(too high/too low)', 'Getting along with family', 'Eating too much, too little', 'Not having support', 'Headaches', 'Getting along with friends', 'Hair loss', 'Lack of communication', 'Heart palpitations', 'w/friends and family', 'Trouble with my vision, eyes', 'My parent(s) stress', 'Stomach aches/pain', 'My sibling(s) stress', 'Diarrhea/constipation (bowels)', 'Parent(s) being', 'Not able to exercise', 'overprotective', 'Other Problems:', 'Other problems:']
